name: npm.autoDetect
desc: Controls whether npm scripts should be automatically detected.

name: npm.packageManager
desc: The package manager used to run scripts.

name: npm.exclude
desc: Configure glob patterns for folders that should be excluded from automatic script detection.

name: npm.enableScriptExplorer
desc: Enable an explorer view for npm scripts when there is no top-level 'package.json' file.

name: npm.enableRunFromFolder
desc: Enable running npm scripts contained in a folder from the Explorer context menu.

name: npm.fetchOnlinePackageInfo
desc: Fetch data from https://registry.npmjs.org and https://registry.bower.io to provide auto-completion and information on hover features on npm dependencies.

name: npm.scriptHover
desc: Display hover with 'Run' and 'Debug' commands for scripts.
